items.badge_description: Dating back to the 17th century, Brown Ales come in a number of varieties. With malty, nutty characteristics and a smooth finish, it's sure to cure your cravings.  That's 5 different Brown Ales. Try 5 more for Level 2.

Hiking, fishing, swimming - there are so many wonderful things to do while you enjoy the great outdoors. Even beer is better when surrounded by the beauty of nature. That's 5 different venues categorized as Great Outdoors. Visit 5 more for Level 2!

items.checkin_comment: Rounding up. Thanks for a great porter Jerry J.

items.checkin_comment: A tasty brew, with great hops notes and the right amount of bitterness. Rounding up.

beer.beer_name: They Can't Stop All of Us

items.badge_description: What happens when you take two or more amazing breweries, throw them into the tank and let them ferment together? An amazing collaboration beer, that’s what! Cheers to working together to create the perfect flavor. That's 10 different beers that have been brewed as a collaboration. Try 5 more for Level 3!
It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 30 check-ins with a photo.
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 35 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 8.

items.badge_description: You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 190 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 39.

You're definitely getting after it now! How about another challenge? After your next workout, reward yourself with Slightly Mighty, a low calorie beer that tastes like something other than a light beer. Slightly Mighty is a true indie craft beer with all the character of a world class IPA, but with only 95 calories, 3.6g carbs, 1g protein and 0g fat per 12oz serving. Learn more!

Raise a can to toast the summer with Dogfish Head's all-new Off­-Centered Activity Box. A summer-centric variety 12-pack of cans that features four of our most sessionable sippers, including fan-favorites like SeaQuench Ale and Namaste White, and two new offerings - SuperEIGHT and Slightly Mighty. The Off-Centered Activity Box also doubles as a functional cooler-just pop it open and add ice!
